00029 template <typename T>
00030 class memory1d {
00031         private: /***  INTERNAL DATA  ***/
00032                 const T* pointer_;
00034                 const std::size_t size_;
00035                 
00036         private: /***  CONSTRUCTORS & DESTRUCTORS ***/
00037                 memory1d() {};
00038                 memory1d(const T* pointer, const std::size_t size) :
00039                         pointer_(pointer), size_(size) {}
00040         public:
00042                 typedef std::size_t size_type;
00043                 typedef T value_type;
00044                 typedef T* pointer;
00045                 
00046                 
00053                 memory1d(const memory1D& copy) : pointer_(copy.pointer_), size_(copy.size_) {}
00054 
00055         public:
00056                 
00061 
00062                 CUPP_HOST CUPP_DEVICE
00063                 size_type size() const {
00064                         return size_;
00065                 }
00066 
00067         public: /***  GPU FUNCTIONS  ***/
00068         #if defined(__CUDACC__)
00069 
00073                 CUPP_DEVICE
00074                 operator T*() const {
00075                         return pointer_;
00076                 }
00077         #endif // defined(__CUDACC__)
00078 
00081         friend cupp::device;
00082 }; // class memory1d
